meanings.definition: The act of rescinding or revoking a decision or agreement.
meanings.sent1: The rescissions of the contract caused a lot of confusion.
meanings.sent2: The company made rescissions to the new policy.
meanings.sent3: The rescissions of the game night plan left everyone disappointed.
meanings.sent4: Her rescissions of the invitation felt like a sudden storm.
meanings.sent5: The rescissions of the rule were like erasing a mistake on a whiteboard.

meanings.definition: The process of canceling or withdrawing something previously authorized.
meanings.sent1: After the rescissions of the project funding, we had to find a new sponsor.
meanings.sent2: The rescissions of the order were unexpected.
meanings.sent3: The rescissions of the vacation plans made us rethink our options.
meanings.sent4: His rescissions of the promise felt like a broken melody.
meanings.sent5: The rescissions of the permit were like hitting a roadblock in our plans.
